0:
apt update
apt -y install gettext-base
envsubst < /kubefiles/server-settings.json > /factorio/config/server-settings.json
exec /docker-entrypoint.sh

version: v1
flags:
  migStrategy: none
sharing:
  timeSlicing:
    renameByDefault: false
    failRequestsGreaterThanOne: false
    resources:
      - name: nvidia.com/gpu
        replicas: 4
